Text:
WHO in their right mind samples an audio book in 8kbps 11kHz??

Dont waste valuable bandwidth to download this book, its nearly impossible to listen to!
thanks, bit low, but audible for me.

The sound is plenty loud for me, but it's like listening to an old radio. Like someone talking into a can w/a german accent back in the olden days. It's definitely a better translation than the others I've briefly looked at. Thanks uploader!
